Human Interactions Robotics Laboratory

HIRo is working to build a low-cost robotic coworker that can assist in workplace tasks and interact with other humans around it.

About Our Projects Tutorials View on GitHub

Archives

Stereo Vision

The goal of this research was to intuitively teach Edwin to recognize and remember objects, thus creating a robust tool for dataset generation.

View project

Push Cup Game

Push Cup is a simple game designed by Connor Novak during the Fall 2016 semester. The game is played on a white playing field with a red SOLO cup and a black dot representing the goal.

View project
